---
category: news
title: "Microsoft Edge Can Now Generate Image Descriptions for Screen Readers"
excerpt: "Microsoft Edge is now capable of generating automatic images descriptions for users browsing the web with screen readers. The accessibility feature uses Azure Cognitive Services intelligence to generate alt text for web images that do not include it."
